titles.title: To suspend until January 1, 1997, the duty on Fomesafen.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/19/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1996, the duty on (5-(2-chloro-4 (trifluoromethyl) phenoxy)-n-(methylsulfonyl)-2-nitrobenzamide (fomesafen).
